title: Dare To Break
description: Arabella GrayStudious. Good girl. Liar.She wants nothing more than to fit in, to be seen, to be loved.And I'm willing to give her all of that—just to see her break.Eli TraversOutcast. Artist. Monster.He hated me at first sight.He's my new stepbrother, and he vows to make me pay for the sins of my mother.In a school where the elite rule and wealth hides dirty secrets, a monster stalks the halls daring the brave to play in the dark. An innocent will be drawn out, their secrets exposed. Hidden desires will be brought to light in a game of sin and madness.Are you brave enough to enter the dark corridors of Churchill Bradley Academy where a deadly game awaits?For the first time, the twisted minds of L. Ann and Claire Marta join forces to bring you the Churchill Bradley Academy series. Containing bully romance, stalking, and dares that become more wicked as time goes on, this new series will delight the senses and leave you questioning who you can trust.Please heed the warnings at the beginning of the book.All four books follow the same couple, with a guaranteed HEA at the end of book 4. MF, with some MFM. This is not a “why-choose” series.
author: L. Ann
